attributes.action: Stop banks taking charges from benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop banks from taking charges from benefits paid into accounts.these benefits are the bare minimum that sick,disabled,jobless and pensioners are expected to live on.furthermore people get into debt because of charges and then incur further charges because of charges made by the banks.this is unfair.banks do have to make a profit this is fully understood but not at the expense of the poorest people in our communities
